metadata.description: He's seen many faces of terror from his years watching over Gotham City—he's seen murderous clowns, strange creatures and all forms of psychopathic killers. But he's never seen anything like this. Amongst the Mayan ruins of the Amazon forest, the Dark Knight of Gotham is out of his element as he faces an intergalactic infestation of…Aliens!
metadata.name: Batman/Aliens
